alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued August 02 at 2:52AM EDT until August 03 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Southeast Georgia Beaches and northeast Flordia beaches in St Johns, Duval, and Nassau counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM EDT this morning through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns
